sentences.sContent: The bomb was planted by right-wing extremists.
sentences.sCn: 炸弹是右翼极端分子放置的。

remMethod.val: 来自extreme(n. 极端， 极度)

words.tran: 极端的；极度的；偏激的；尽头的
极端；末端；最大程度；极端的事物
极端；绝境；非常手段；手足
极端主义（尤指政治上的极右或极左）；极端性；过激主义

trans.tranOther: someone who has extreme political opinions and aims, and who is willing to do unusual or illegal things in order to achieve them
